title: Axe of Woe
data:
{{version030}}
{{flavour|As you hold this axe your mind does not feel fully your own. Your body begins to exhibit strength far beyond its capabilities, and your movements become guided by Makhleb.}}

[[File:urand_axe_of_woe.png]] '''''an Axe of Woe'''''<ref>{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1278}}</ref>

+âˆž [[executioner's axe]] or [[broad axe]] (Its base type is adjusted to the biggest two-handed axe the player's species can wield)

==Desirability==
This incredibly powerful artefact can only be found in a [[Dungeon Sprint]] map: [[Arena of Blood]] (a.k.a. meatsprint). You will really need its help.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], the Axe of Woe didn't cause enemies to explode into gory bits.
